mainText:
To all of Steve's friends and family: Steve was a great man, and you 
should feel better if you realize this, he accomplished so much in his 
lifetime. He created Apple which is a very successful company that has a 
very bright future. He basically played a big part in creating the 
future. I personally look at Steve Jobs the same way I look at Albert 
Einstien, a pure genius. I wish the best for you and I'm sorry for your 
loss.
author: Josh
